tasks.instruction: Create a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) for the Digital Guidance Platform. The platform should include: 1) Aptitude & Interest-Based Course Suggestion with quizzes, 2) Course-to-Career Path Mapping with visual charts, 3) Nearby Government Colleges Directory with location-based listings, 4) Timeline Tracker for notifications, 5) User profiles with AI-driven recommendations. Include competitive analysis of existing career guidance platforms, market research on student needs in government college enrollment, target user personas (Class 10/12 students and parents), technical requirements, and implementation roadmap. Save the PRD as /workspace/digital_guidance_platform/docs/prd.md

Design a comprehensive system architecture for the Digital Guidance Platform based on the PRD from task 1. Include frontend architecture for web application, backend API design, database schema for user profiles/courses/colleges/assessments, recommendation engine architecture, notification system design, and integration points for location services. Consider scalability, offline capabilities, and mobile responsiveness. Save the system design as /workspace/digital_guidance_platform/docs/system_design.md
